pageContext.claim: “Nationwide, the Interior Department -- thank you, David --has been drilling permits -- and you've seen drilling permits increase by over 300 percent since I've been in office.”
pageContext.analysis: The Interior Department approved 40 percent more drilling permits in fiscal 2018 than in fiscal 2017— which includes the last four months of the Obama administration. It has increased 55 percent over fiscal 2016 — not 300 percent.
